metadata.name: Apocaliptica
metadata.description: Jean Stern lives her life surrounded by an illusion, and like the rest of humanity she lives behind the veil of reality which obscures the true nature of things. Today humankind hopelessly confronts itself, unknowingly determining the outcome of a conflict reason can do nothing but dismiss as absurd. However, this struggle and its conclusion were foretold long ago. With her life in ruins and the world crumbling her, Jean tries to find the only thing in her life that was ever truly real. But some truths are used to obscure even bigger lies.
